attributes.name: query
attributes.description: Text for which the user is searching

attributes.name: hide-filter-button
attributes.description: Whether to hide the Filter button. Set attribute "hide-filter-button" to do so.

attributes.name: disable-filter-button
attributes.description: Whether to disable the Filter button. Set attribute "disable-filter-button" to do so.

attributes.name: nr-selected-filters
attributes.description: Number of filters the user has been selected (shown in the badge) (optional)

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon shown in the search background

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Text shown in the search box if the user didn't enter any query

properties.name: query
properties.description: Text for which the user is searching

properties.name: hideFilterButton
properties.description: Whether to hide the Filter button. Set attribute "hide-filter-button" to do so.

properties.name: disableFilterButton
properties.description: Whether to disable the Filter button. Set attribute "disable-filter-button" to do so.

properties.name: nrSelectedFilters
properties.description: Number of filters the user has been selected (shown in the badge) (optional)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon shown in the search background

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Text shown in the search box if the user didn't enter any query

attributes.name: filters
attributes.description: All filters from which the user can choose

attributes.name: selected-filters
attributes.description: All filters that have been selected by the user, e.g. `{ age: [ "child", "teen" ] }`

attributes.name: reset-button
attributes.description: Text for the reset button. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: save-button
attributes.description: Text for the save button. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: no-values-label
attributes.description: Label shown if no values are selected for a filter. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: filters
properties.description: All filters from which the user can choose

properties.name: selectedFilters
properties.description: All filters that have been selected by the user, e.g. `{ age: [ "child", "teen" ] }`

properties.name: resetButton
properties.description: Text for the reset button. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: saveButton
properties.description: Text for the save button. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: noValuesLabel
properties.description: Label shown if no values are selected for a filter. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Query for which the user was searching

attributes.name: filters
attributes.description: All filters from which the user can choose

attributes.name: selected-filters
attributes.description: All filters that have been selected by the user, e.g. `{ age: [ "child", "teen" ] }`

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Items that are currently shown in the lister

attributes.name: has-more
attributes.description: True if further items could be loaded

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: True if items are currently loaded

attributes.name: hide-filter-button
attributes.description: Whether to hide the Filter button. Set attribute "hide-filter-button" to do so.

attributes.name: count
attributes.description: Number of items loaded per page (i.e. for each click on [more])

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon shown in the search background

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Text shown in the search box if the user didn't enter any query

attributes.name: no-results-text
attributes.description: Text shown if no results are found. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: more-button
attributes.description: Text for the more button to load more data. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: reset-button
attributes.description: Text for the reset button in the filter dialog. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: save-button
attributes.description: Text for the save button in the filter dialog. Use this property to localize the element.

attributes.name: no-values-label
attributes.description: Label shown if no values are selected for a filter. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: search
properties.description: Query for which the user was searching

properties.name: filters
properties.description: All filters from which the user can choose

properties.name: selectedFilters
properties.description: All filters that have been selected by the user, e.g. `{ age: [ "child", "teen" ] }`

properties.name: items
properties.description: Items that are currently shown in the lister

properties.name: hasMore
properties.description: True if further items could be loaded

properties.name: loading
properties.description: True if items are currently loaded

properties.name: hideFilterButton
properties.description: Whether to hide the Filter button. Set attribute "hide-filter-button" to do so.

properties.name: count
properties.description: Number of items loaded per page (i.e. for each click on [more])

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Icon shown in the search background

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Text shown in the search box if the user didn't enter any query

properties.name: noResultsText
properties.description: Text shown if no results are found. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: moreButton
properties.description: Text for the more button to load more data. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: resetButton
properties.description: Text for the reset button in the filter dialog. Use this property to localize the element.

properties.name: saveButton
properties.description: Text for the save button in the filter dialog. Use this property to localize the element.
